Metadata.title: Dastan Abikov
Metadata.description: Entrepreneur, investor, speaker, activist, and diplomat. Dastan Abikov was born in 1999 in Bishkek, Kyrgyz Republic.

interviewYoutube.title: Interview with Dastan Abikov
interviewYoutube.description: Dastan Abikov talks about his life, business, and future plans

Biography.subtitle: Biography
Biography.title: WAS BORN IN 1999 IN KYRGYZ REPUBLIC

shortFacts.0: At the age of 15, he started engaging in entrepreneurship
shortFacts.1: At the age of 21, he earned his first million dollars
shortFacts.2: At the age of 23, he developed a socio-economic development program for the Kyrgyz Republic
shortFacts.3: At the age of 24, he spoke at a commission meeting at the United Nations (UN)
shortFacts.4: He received an education at the Kyrgyz Economic University and Harvard Business School

0.description: Dastan Abikov was born in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan.

2.description: Founded a successful contracting company in the construction industry. Was recognized by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology as one of the most promising young entrepreneurs. Received support from the Prime Minister of the Kyrgyz Republic.

3.description: Graduated from Tursun Temirova School in Kochkor District, Naryn Region.

4.description: Earned his first million dollars. Started sponsoring the Kyrgyzstan Jiu-Jitsu Sports Federation. Started sponsoring the cultural project 'Ilgeri'. Became a member of the U.S. Chamber of Commerce.

5.description: Completed a professional education program at Harvard Business School (HBS). Became a member of the Harvard Business School community. Developed a socio-economic development program for the Kyrgyz Republic. [Link to the program]

6.description: Graduated from the economic program at the Kyrgyz Economic University (KEU). Founded the Kyrgyz Fund. Scholarship programs operate under the fund's aegis. [Link to the fund and scholarship application]

7.description: Founded the 'Sustainable Mountain Development Fund' (SMDF) in New York. Became a member of the Mountain Partnership at the United Nations (UN). Spoke at a commission meeting at the United Nations (UN).
